0.2.name: wordpress/likehack
0.2.description:
Engage your blog's audience with content curated by you or people your follow on Facebook and Twitter.

How it works?

Likehack makes it easy and clear with four simple features:

  1. Likehack content feed widget shows only links shared by you or people you follow (no TMI or bla-bla posts and tweets).
  2. You can choose what to show (only links shared by you, or all links including shared by people you follow).
  3. Likehack extracts link's titles so it's realy clear what is this link about.
  4. Likehack has filters so you can eliminate lolcats, Instagram photos and other media content from your curated feed.

As a result, your readers see clear curated content feed from your social accounts, that can be really engaging and interesting.

Benefits for your blog

  • Engaging users with fresh curates content;
  • It takes no efforts;
  • Pushing users to follow your social accounts.

How t
